name: Love or Shit
description:
Visual Novel meets Strategic labyrinth solving in a pixelated post y2k aesthetic. This is a game about gaining and losing control both biologically and story. Are you speeding to finish the game, or are you rushing toward something else entirely? Are your actions for the better or for the absolutely uncontrollable mischief? Chapter Red (3) has disturbing content (psychological content) that is not recommended for children or the faint of heart

Control Direction: 

  • Continues the dialogue with 【SPACE】 key. 
  • Use 【WASD】or【Arrow keys】to choose answers
  • Use 【WASD】or【Arrow keys】to play labyrinth

P.S. This game was a subissiom to Global Gam Jam 2022.
